description:
From end to end, Le Sentier des Caps is a 51 km trail offering many vantage points overlooking the St-Lawrence River.  Many well maintained shelters with woodstoves.  Better avoid the month of June, when blackflies are nasty!

Visit their web site at www.sentierdescaps.com.

Reservation or permit required.
directions: From Qu?bec City, drive on to road 138 east, until St-Tite-des-Caps.  Registration office is located at 2 rue Leclerc, in St-Tite-des-Caps.
title: Sentiers des Caps
